text: Asuka Saitō is a Japanese idol singer, actress and fashion model. She is a member of the Japanese girl group Nogizaka46. Mana Hayase in the Japanese version of You Are the Apple of My Eye and Midori Asakusa in the movie and television versions of Keep Your Hands Off Eizouken! are two of her most notable acting appearances. Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Tokyo Category:Actors from Tokyo
title: Asuka Saitō
